summary: Federal Home Loan Banks provide funding to member banks through loans. We found that FHLBanks can play a key role in the health of small banks, in particular. Some observers have raised concerns that banks may increase their FHLBank borrowing when they’re in trouble, which could mask problems. However, we found that FHLBank borrowing has been relatively consistent for most banks, even in times of...
title: Federal Home Loan Banks: Role During Financial Stress and Members' Borrowing Trends and Outcomes
